product_name: Mountaineers Books Staying Alive in Avalanche Terrain - 2nd Edtion
long_description: . Author: Bruce Tremper. Softcover; 318 pages; black-and-white illustrations and photographs. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2008. Ideal for snowboarders, snowshoers, skiers and mountaineers, this expanded edition features the latest snow science and safety procedures. Learn step-by-step procedures to assess avalanche hazards, travel safely and, if necessary, carry out a rescue. Author emphasizes controlling the human foibles that lead to avalanche accidents. Simple diagrams convey concepts and photographs illustrate examples.
short_description: Staying Alive in Avalanche Terrain equips you with the knowledge needed to successfully negotiate the backcountry.
